1.text: Place the burger on a piece of paper or foil 2.5 times the size of the burger.

2.text: Bring two sides of the paper together over the burger.

3.text: Fold the top edge of the paper down until it's against the burger.

4.text: Tuck in the top edges of the paper on the sides of the burger.

5.text: Push the remaining triangle-shaped pieces under the burger.

6.text: Cut the burger in half or roll back the paper to eat it in the wrap.

7.text: Clean a head of lettuce and tear off 2 large leaves.

8.text: Place the leaves of lettuce on a plate and put your burger on them.

9.text: Fold the lettuce leaves up and over the burger.

10.text: Place a cooked burger and your desired toppings on a large tortilla.

11.text: Fold the tortilla over the center of the burger.

12.text: Roll the tortilla around the burger on the other edge.
